EmailTemplate.subject: Connecting the Most Overlooked Part of Aerospace: The Ground!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
GoDirect Ground solutions can cut delays by up to 30 percent.
Honeywell expanded its Connected Aircraft services to one of the last unconnected aerospace frontiers, the ground. The GoDirect Ground <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect-ground-handling-service]]> solutions can connect an airportâ€™s ramp service into one single, managed solution that provides airlines and ground handlers with real-time insights into vehicle activity anywhere at the airport.
The result? Better on-time performance, lower maintenance costs and greater fuel efficiency!
GET CONNECTED NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
